1.Squat jumps:
i)Stand with the feet hip-width apart and arms at the sides.
ii)Bend at the knees to squat.
iii)From the squat position, jump in the air and extend the hips until the body is straight.
iv)Land softly on the balls of the feet, rolling backward to absorb the shock in the heels.
v)Repeat using different arm movements to adjust the difficulty.

2.Screamer lunges:
i)Stand with the feet hip-width apart.
ii)Extend the right leg back to a lunge position.
iii)Push off with the right foot to lift the right knee to hip height, jumping in the air while doing so.
iv)Return the right foot to the starting position and repeat for 10 lunges on one side.
v)Repeat for the left leg.

3.Burpees:
i)Start with the body in a pushup position.
ii)Push off the balls of the feet to bring the knees into the chest and land in a squat.
iii)Jump out of the squat, raising the hands in the air before landing softly back into the squat.
iv)Place the hands back on the floor underneath the shoulders.
v)Spring the legs back to return to the starting position.
